DialogueOption.Text: ... so are you gonna talk or what?

Dialogue.Page: Yeah I just wanted to be a little dramatic haha.
So what's up? I will answer all your questions truthfully and canonically.

DialogueOption.Text: What's the name of your species?
How do you know my language?
Can you use that magic staff over there to project your thoughts into my brain?

Dialogue.Page: My name is Scombroid the Third.
We are called the Grombo, and our space station is called Gromboville, and our home moon is called Grombo-moon, and the ringed planet it orbits is called Grombo-ringed-planet.
In our native language, also called Grombo, Grombo means "guy who lives on the moon or also maybe on a space station".
Well and then it also means "the language that the guy who lives on the moon or also maybe on a space station speaks".
I don't, we're in like, a magic simulation thing right now, like this thing is literally reading our minds and stuff.
You're just speaking Grombo to me right now honestly.
When I'm done you can project your thoughts into my brain too.
Then I'm going to dip and just kinda walk into the river.
Kinda messed up I know, but I'm like 50 gorillion years old and trapped inside this simulation forever so...
Yeah... Okay doing the projection thing now. Also my throat hurts so I will never speak again. Okay bye.
